answers.answer: Me too! Ftm! Due april 7th!!!! Congrats! I am so ready!

Due April 7th too! Had to stop me going into labor twice already so hoping to get as close to that as possible. Also I'm so uncomfortable that I'm happy with 38 weeks!

Due April 13th with my first baby boy. I'm so excited. I feel blessed to make it this far with a short cervix. 5 more weeks to go!

question: First time moms? How far along are you? I can't wait to have my little girl. I'm obsessed lol. I have dreams every night about holding my baby. I can't wait to show her the world!!
title: Due date coming soon! April 7th! I'm soooo excited
